achievements.name: Head of the Class
achievements.description: Play a complete round with every class.

achievements.name: World Traveler
achievements.description: Play a complete game on 2Fort, Dustbowl, Granary, Gravel Pit, Hydro, and Well (CP).

achievements.name: Team Doctor
achievements.description: Accumulate 25000 heal points as a Medic.

achievements.name: Flamethrower
achievements.description: Set five enemies on fire in 30 seconds.

achievements.name: Sentry Gunner
achievements.description: Accumulate 10 sentry gun kills with a single sentry.

achievements.name: Nemesis
achievements.description: Get five revenge kills.

achievements.name: Hard to Kill
achievements.description: Get five kills in a row without dying.

achievements.name: Master of Disguise
achievements.description: Trick an opposing Medic into healing you.

achievements.name: With Friends Like these...
achievements.description: Play in a game with five or more players from your Friends list.

achievements.name: Dynasty
achievements.description: Win 20 games.

achievements.name: Hardcore
achievements.description: Accumulate 1000 total kills.

achievements.name: Grey Matter
achievements.description: Get 25 headshots as a Sniper.

achievements.name: First Do No Harm
achievements.description: Play a full round without killing any enemies, and score the highest on a team of 6 or more players.

achievements.name: Quadruple Bypass
achievements.description: Heal a teammate who's taking fire from 4 enemies at once.

achievements.name: Group Health
achievements.description: Work with 2 other Medics to deploy 3 simultaneous ÜberCharges.

achievements.name: Surgical Prep
achievements.description: Have an ÜberCharge ready before the Setup phase ends.

achievements.name: Trauma Queen
achievements.description: Deploy 3 ÜberCharges in less than 5 minutes, and assist in 5 kills during that time.

achievements.name: Double Blind Trial
achievements.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge within 8 seconds of a nearby enemy Medic deploying his.

achievements.name: Play Doctor
achievements.description: In a team with no Medics, be the first person to switch to Medic after a teammate calls for 'Medic!', and then heal 500 health.

achievements.name: Triage
achievements.description: Deploy an ÜberCharge on a teammate less than a second before they're hit by a critical explosive.

achievements.name: Preventive Medicine
achievements.description: Block the enemy from capturing a control point with an ÜberCharged teammate.

achievements.name: Consultation
achievements.description: Assist a fellow Medic in killing 3 enemies in a single life.

achievements.name: Does It Hurt When I Do This?
achievements.description: Kill 50 Scouts with your syringe gun.

achievements.name: Peer Review
achievements.description: Kill 10 Medics with your bone saw.

achievements.name: Big Pharma
achievements.description: Assist a Heavy in killing 10 enemies, where neither of you die.

achievements.name: You'll Feel a Little Prick
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Scout.

achievements.name: Autoclave
achievements.description: Assist in burning 5 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Pyro.

achievements.name: Blunt Trauma
achievements.description: Assist in punching 2 enemies with a single ÜberCharge on a Heavy.

achievements.name: Medical Breakthrough
achievements.description: Assist in destroying 5 enemy Engineer buildings with a single ÜberCharge on a Demoman.

achievements.name: Midwife Crisis
achievements.description: Heal an Engineer as he repairs his sentry gun while it's under enemy fire.

achievements.name: Ubi concordia, ibi victoria
achievements.description: Assist in killing 3 enemies on an enemy control point, in a single life.

achievements.name: Grand Rounds
achievements.description: Heal 200 teammates after they've called for 'Medic!'.

achievements.name: Powerhouse Offense
achievements.description: Win 2Fort with a shutout.

achievements.name: Lightning Offense
achievements.description: Win Well in 5 minutes or less.

achievements.name: Relentless Offense
achievements.description: Win Hydro without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: Impenetrable Defense
achievements.description: Successfully defend Dustbowl without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: Impossible Defense
achievements.description: Successfully defend Gravel Pit without giving up a capture.

achievements.name: Infernal Medicine
achievements.description: Extinguish 100 burning teammates.

achievements.name: Doctor Assisted Homicide
achievements.description: Assist in killing 20 nemeses.

achievements.name: Placebo Effect
achievements.description: Kill 2 enemies in a single life, while having your ÜberCharge ready, but undeployed.

achievements.name: Sawbones
achievements.description: Hit enemies with your bonesaw 5 times in a row without dying or missing.

achievements.name: Intern
achievements.description: Accumulate 7000 heal points in a single life.

achievements.name: Specialist
achievements.description: Accumulate 10000 heal points health in a single life.

achievements.name: Chief of Staff
achievements.description: Accumulate 1 million total heal points.

achievements.name: Hypocritical Oath
achievements.description: Kill an enemy Spy that you have been healing.

achievements.name: Medical Intervention
achievements.description: Save a falling teammate from dying on impact.

achievements.name: Second Opinion
achievements.description: ÜberCharge 2 teammates at once.

achievements.name: Autopsy Report
achievements.description: Provide an enemy with a freezecam shot of you taunting above their ragdoll.

achievements.name: FYI I am A Medic

achievements.name: Family Practice

achievements.name: Bedside Manner

achievements.name: On The Rocks
achievements.description: Lose at Rock, Paper, Scissors 3 times in a row with Rock.

achievements.name: Running With Scissors
achievements.description: Win at Rock, Paper, Scissors 3 times in a row with Scissors.

achievements.name: May I Cut In, Too?
achievements.description: Melee kill 10 players while they are doing the Square Dance taunt.

achievements.name: Showboat
achievements.description: Do 10 partner taunts with a teammate while capturing a control point.

achievements.name: Flip-Kabob
achievements.description: Ignite a player that is being flipped by someone using the Flippin' Awesome taunt.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Bumper Crop
achievements.description: Kill 30 enemies by bumping their bumper cars off the tracks.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Up All Night To Get Ducky
achievements.description: Collect 250 ducks.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Hat Trick
achievements.description: Score 3 goals in bumper car soccer.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: ReinKartnation
achievements.description: Respawn 30 ghost teammates during bumper car games.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Arms Reduction
achievements.description: Kill 15 enemies while under the effect of Merasmus's melee-only curse.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Step Right Up
achievements.description: Earn 4 of the Carnival of Carnage achievements.

achievements.name: Carnival of Carnage: Bumper to Bumper to Bumper
achievements.description: Win each of the 3 bumper car games to earn a bonus Halloween Gift Cauldron.

achievements.name: The Power and the Glory
achievements.description: Win 142 Rounds.

achievements.name: Balance of Power
achievements.description: Win a round in which the enemy team has attempted to capture your final control point.

achievements.name: Power Trip
achievements.description: Capture the final control point within 15 seconds of your team capturing the previous control point.

achievements.name: Power Down
achievements.description: Kill 15 enemies while they are capturing a point.

achievements.name: Wet Work
achievements.description: Kill five enemies while they are in the water.

achievements.name: Tune Merasmus's Multi-Dimensional Television
achievements.description: Reveal the mystery of the PASS Time TV Room.

achievements.name: Jackpot!
achievements.description: Win 10 rounds playing PASS Time.
